pages.text: $(item)Milkmade Hat$() is obtained by cooking 1 $(item)Naked Nostrils$(), 1 $(item)Bamboo$(), 1 $(thing)Dairy$(), and any filler in the $(pot)Ultimate Crock Pot$().$(br)When equipped on the Helmet Slot or Head Slot of Curios (if Curios is installed), it restores 1 Hunger and 0.1 Saturation every 5 seconds.
